description.description: Used for meta description. If left blank something like "78 Liturgies, Quotes, Scripture guides, Illustrations, Series, Lectionaries, and Blogs related to Deuteronomy curated to help you craft your next worship service" will automatically be used

hide_series_nav.description: If this is unchecked, it will flip the way the next / previous button works. if unchecked: if this blog is part of a series, the next will go to the NEWER post. If it is unchecked then it will go next to the next older post

starts_with.description:
Useful if you want to use the child index on another page other than a parent landing index page. 
this should be everything after pastorsworkshop.com/ but before individual pages. 
to to show the Bible, you'd do: 
bible/
you should include the / or else bible-copyright pages would show as well...

whole_site.description: Make component get data from whole site? By default this is false, meaning the content returned is restricted to this folder unless a starts-with is provided. this will override starts-with

highlight_affix_num_tokens.description: Controls how big the snippet is when a search term is entered.  This is the "number of tokens" on either side of the highlighted text.

default_snippet_character_length.description: Max length of teaser snippet content?

typesense_webhook_on.description:
Typesense is the cloud software used for searches. Should the typesense webhook work every time a story changes? set to false if lots of changs will happen at once. 
Stories that are unpublished or deleted will still be removed from typesense regardless of this setting. https://cloud.typesense.org/clusters/10bzm9324tdau5vrp

searchable_content.description: only these content types will be synced with typesense

seo_title_prefix.description: Text will be placed at the start of all SEO/tab titles across your site, typically the company name with some separator.

seo_default_title.description: This title will be used for SEO if a page-specific title is not set.

index_meta_description.description: Used as the PRIMARY for derivative pages (/on/  or /from/) and as a fallback for index pages that are lacking a description. This is the text after "{number results} {resource types} related to {topic} {THIS TEXT}"

seo_image.description: It will show when this URL is shared in tools suck as slack or online on sites such as LinkedIn or Instagram.

seo_icon.description: This is your website's Favicon that will appear on phone home screens, in the browser tab, etc.

seo_icon_svg.description: This is your website's Favicon that will appear on phone home screens, in the browser tab when an SVG vector format os used, must be an SVG.

nb_show.description: Enable to show notification bar on website

cookie_text.default_value: We use cookies to track page views and improve your experience.

merge_source.description: The one to be copied. If you were merging keywords, this would be the "losing" one that you want to copy into the other one.

merge_target.description:
This is where the source one will be copied to. 
This can be used to apply tags retroactively -- so you could for instance use a source of "Joy" (source)  and then tag all things with category "Being Human" (target)  to now also have the "Joy" keyword. 
Once both of these are selected, save. The screen should now show the merge options

unlock_all_content_until.description: If set, then all content on the site will be accessible by anyone (stripe user or not) until the date and time selected

contact_email_notifications.description: who should emails be sent to? separate emails with comma, no spaces.

lectionary_colors.description:
Colors added here will be applied to lectionary posts
Colors can be modified in data_sources > Colors: Special

no_index_threshold.description: If there are fewer than this many results on an index page a no-index header will be added to the page and rel=canonical will be applied pointing to the parent page if applickable

max_facet_values.description: This sets the cap for how many /on/ and /from/ links can appear. This also controlls what pages get added to the sitemap

iframe.description: Useful for youtube iframe embeds, etc.

add_author.description: Add a new author, then come back and they will be selectable here.

title.description: If left blank, the story name will be used as the meta title

description.description: If left blank the first 155 characters off the illustration will be used as the meta description. a

title.description: If used, it will override the default, the default is the category name.

content_filter_categories.description: Use whichever ONE of these you need. If Categories is checked it will be used regardless of the other one

description.description: When left blank a more curated meta description will be dynamically created like "400 Quotes, Illustrations, and Blogs on Joy curated for your next worship service"

condition.description: Only show if these conditions are met, if blank the field will always show

regex_validation.description: Enter custom regex validation for the field if desired.  Example: /^red$|^blue$|^green$/

description.description: When left blank a more curated meta description will be dynamically created like "400 Quotes, Illustrations, and Blogs on Joy curated for your next worship service"

title.description: If left blank then the title will be "{{pageName}} | {{primaryScripture}}. It will be automatically appended with "| The Pastors Workshop" so keep it minimal

new_quote.description: Add an quote, come back, and it will populate into the dropdown list above

new_illustration.description: Add an author, come back, and it will populate into the dropdown list above

add_liturgy.description: Add new. Once added, come back and you'll be able to select it above.

first_or_last.description: Is this the first or last guide of the cycle? If so: indicate that here. this is so that the next/previous buttons will properly jump cycles at the beginning / end of year

show_season_image.description: Update this in site_settings > global content settings > lectionary

lectionary_season.description: LImit what is shown in this component to the seasons selected

show_title.description: should the name of this piece of content be displayed inline on liturgy, series, and scripture-guide pages?

new_author.description: Add a new author, then come back and they will be selectable here.

title.description: If left empty, the meta title will be the story name

description.description: If left empty, the first 155 characters of the liturgy will be the meta description.

title.description: If used, this will become the page SEO title. Otherwise the page name will be used.

description.description: used for meta description for index page

link.description: Optional link for parent menu item

sub_links.description: If you wish to make this a dropdown menu add sublinks.  If sublinks are blank the link field will be used.

color.description: This will be used on this page as well as on sub-pages if this is a root level landing pages (where applicable)

hide_seo.description: If checked, this age will remove itself from search engines and search results.  It is still accessible by the URL but will not be cataloged.

seo_image.description: It will show when this URL is shared in tools suck as slack or online on sites such as LinkedIn or Instagram. If this is not set, it will fallback to the image set within the site configuration.

description.description: If left blank, a snippet will be created from the first 155 characters of the quote. If the quote is shorter than that, 80% of the whole quote will be shown.

new_author.description: Add a new author, then come back and they will be selectable here.

add_liturgy.description: Add new. Once added, come back and you'll be able to select it above.

new_quote.description: Add or find quotes, come back, and you'll be able to select them above

new_illustration.description: Add or find illustrations, come back, and you'll be able to select them above.

book.description: Optional! Selecting this will insert all scripture guides from just one book of the Bible.

only_recent.description: How old of content do you want to show in number of days. if 0, then it will be all time.

hide_series_title.description:
This is the parent folder name, so  on the page/series/summer-settings/....
it would be "Summer Settings"

new_quote.description: Add an quote, come back, and it will populate into the dropdown list above

new_illustration.description: Add an author, come back, and it will populate into the dropdown list above

add_find_liturgy.description: Find liturgy or add new. Once added or found, come back and you'll be able to select it above.

series_sub_section.description:
adding a colon ":" here will have an affect on the parent child-index. It lets you enable grouping of things. 
for instance, Road Trips: 2 will let there be a sub-section of Road Trips in the child-index list

override_pareng_color.description: By default, the color of the parent page will be used for headings. if this is checked, then the color above will  be shown for headings

description.description: Use for meta for index page.

public.description: should this content be viewable without an account?
